message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1400000. It's a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. It's the maximum I'm willing to pay.

Bob, I understand your position, but $1200000 doesn't quite cover my costs.  I'm willing to come down to $1300000. It's still a great deal for you, considering the product's value.  Let's see if we can find a compromise.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit shy of your price. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1250000.
